availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth Kennedy. Held eight slaves in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 263. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 33. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 13. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Lancaster, p. 61.
